description:
Based on a science fiction novel series, Crest of the Stars (Seikai no Monsho) is the first installment in this sci-fi saga. The story follows Jinto, whose world was taken over by the largest empire in the galaxy: the Abh. Jinto's father, the planet's prime minister, handed their world over to the Abh in exchange for a standing in the Abh Empire. As a result, Jinto became a prince and was shipped off for an Abh Education. There he meets a princess of the Abh Empire, Lafiel, whom he quickly befriends despite her cold exterior. The Abh Empire is plunged into war soon after and the story continues from there...

(Source: Anime News Network)

Note: The last episode aired with a runtime of ~40 minutes as opposed to the standard 24 minute long episode.

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/篠原俊哉)

Frequent presence in [P.A. Works](https://anilist.co/studio/132/)' shows.

Katsuhisa Hattori was a Japanese classical composer who wrote music for anime films, television series, and OVAs. In the west, he was best known for his soundtrack compositions for [Argento Soma](https://anilist.co/anime/285/Argento-Soma/) and [Hiroyuki Morioka](https://anilist.co/staff/97473/Hiroyuki-Morioka)'s [Seikai](https://anilist.co/anime/290/Crest-of-the-Stars/) series.

Katsuhisa Hattori was a Japanese classical composer who wrote music for anime films, television series, and OVAs. In the west, he was best known for his soundtrack compositions for [Argento Soma](https://anilist.co/anime/285/Argento-Soma/) and [Hiroyuki Morioka](https://anilist.co/staff/97473/Hiroyuki-Morioka)'s [Seikai](https://anilist.co/anime/290/Crest-of-the-Stars/) series.

[Website](http://ninelives.co.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/akai_takami)

Akai attended Osaka University of Arts majoring in fine art . While studying there, Akai created the character designs for the Daicon III opening animation. The main staff for the Daicon III and Daicon IV opening animations went on to create the animation studio Gainax. Akai was in the same class as Hiroyuki Yamaga and Hideaki Anno. He is married to mangaka Higuchi, Kimiko.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/高橋晃_(アニメーター%29)

Affiliated with [Bandai Namco Pictures](https://anilist.co/studio/6116/). Noted for his work in the Precure franchise.

_Note: Not to be confused with the [other animator](https://anilist.co/staff/147908/)._
Joined Audio Planning U in 1982, where he studied under [Yasuo Urakami](https://anilist.co/staff/111277/).
Twitter __Yukio Nishimoto__ is a Japanese director, animation director, episode director and storyboard artist.
